body.p: Mr. Voltaire Scott. wishes to be appointed a Notary Public. I know Mr. Scott. as worthy & well qualified. He is clerk to Maj G. A Camp Pay Master U.S.A. stationed here as a local Pay Master, to pay discharged men & resigned officers. Every resigned officer has to make oath to his account. before some civil officer authorized to administer oaths, & it is a very great convenience to them, as well as to the Pay Master, to have some one convenient. By appointing Mr Scott, you accommodate officers who apply for pay, & confer the honor upon a very worthy gentleman.

I have the honor to remain
Your Excellencys most obdt &c
Philip Speed

Gov. James F. Robinson
Frankfort Ky
